bio: An optimistic with +6 years experience wants to make everyone optimistic!
contributionDescription:
Many new users suffer from a lack of resources and difficulty in obtaining information about Blockchain, Web3, Optimism, etc.. in one place, and thus this makes them not optimistic.
I present to you a comprehensive portal to make the new user optimistic and the existing user more optimistic.
The portal contains many articles that answer the questions "What is..?"
and "how to..?"
As most users use these questions to search for information.
In addition to that, There is an educational portal based on the gamification system, where users participate in competitions and learn at the same time.

contributionLinks.description: A portal to make users have knowledge about Optimism
A quiz portal based on gamification about Optimism

impactDescription:
New users are getting optimistic! And existing users are becoming more optimistic!
Thousands of views and contributions in the game portal are proof that users have now knowledge about Optimism and the Optimism ecosystem, and have the experience to participate in governance and start using the Optimism network and its dŸêApps.
pwCategorySuggestions: Web3 Education, Community Building, User Experience & Adoption
